participant_1.name: Leo
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, Leo often wonders about the extent of his powers and how they connect to his unique condition.
participant_1.background: since the surgery i have had strange powers. i was born with my heart outside my body. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i'm a boy.

participant_2.name: Dr. Sarah
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and determined, Dr. Sarah is passionate about her work and eager to find a fulfilling position that allows her to help others.
participant_2.background: i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i enjoy going to the park. i am now looking for a new job.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
